cause.description:
Support, enable, motivate and enhance the education of children in poorer areas of the world. It is true that they need support and food. However, teaching them and enabling them to grow independently would help them to understand this world better and build the future of their countries on aware foundations.
1. Decent education is the solution.
2. Raising awareness leads to a better world for the rest of us
3. Teach your children and other children well
cause.name: Educate Poor Kids
